runs.comm: he's hit the pads first ball and has had a pretty big shout for lbw, that pitched in line with leg, and  straightened and bounced into the pad above the knee roll, not given, and not a bad shout either
similar line, a fuller length, and he;s smacked it behind square leg, the Sri Lanka chairman of selectors would have been proud of that stroke
holds its line on a good length, and is pushed awkwardly to midwicket
good one, yorker at 134 kph on the stumps, some inswing into the left hander, who jams bat down in time

that has disappeared into the grass banks beyond deep midwicket, you would be pardoned for thinking this is Jayasuriya of the late 90s and early 2000s, picks up a pitched up delivery and hammers it with a full-blooded swing
too short, too wide, and he reaches out to cut it, thick edge flies to third man, and through his hands, and Sri Lanka are racing away
neat start, length ball on off, quietly pushed down the pitch
good length, angled in, played out to midwicket
swinging in, from wide of the crease, and no chance for the keeper-captain down the leg side
can;t do much with a length ball off the pads, balloons towards square leg off the pad, given as runs, might have been a thin inside edge
pushed towards point
hit on the pads outside leg stump with a length ball, it scoots behind square
makes room and has a huge swing, thick edge flies to the fine third man rope
didn't make too much difference to him, he sees a fullish delivery on off, and lunges down on a knee to wallop a slog sweep over midwicket
defended off the front foot
down the leg side and swept fine, man at 45 cuts it off to his left

uh oh, shortish, flat delivery, he's gone back for the pull, gone through with the stroke, but has missed, and the ball has hit middle, not the kind of delivery you get bowled off, but Bangladesh will take it

massive mix-up, Chandimal almost did Perera in there in his haste to get off the mark, pushes forward towards cover, and takes off, yes and no, but he keeps running, non-striker makes a very late start, the throw comes in, he's almost gone, but  a big dive saves him
comes forward and drives to mid off
second time Rubel goes miles down leg, and gives Mushfiqur more grief, and some pain too it seems this time, as the captain sits on the ground and takes off his left glove
full on the stumps, pushed down the track
nearly driven straight to mid on, drops just short, and they squeeze in a tight single
pitched up, and pushed down the pitch, mid off runs around and dives to field
full and into the pads, whipped hard through square, there is a man in the deep
gets width outside off, and cracks it over cover
pushed down to long on
comes down, stops, and attempts a sweep, takes a run as the ball rolls to off, keeper is after it, and seems to have hurt himself again as he falls over while trying to throw
walks out and eases it past midwicket, long on keeps them to one
dances out and slams a full one angled in over mid on now
quick and outside off, good length, defended
width for the cut, but hit on the bounce into point, more hesitation but they finally go through for the run
outside leg, he misses the sweep, Razzak appeals, just in case
down he comes, and shovels another maximum over deep midwicket, swinging furiously from off stump
steps out again, gets too close to the pitch and digs it out to cover
threatened to come out again, Razzak saw that and fired it fast and full across the left-hander, he adjusted well to steer it past point
skips out, it is angled across quick, he eases it to point
goes for the cut as he sees some width, but there is bounce too, and he chops it on the bounce to the keeper
lovely, finesse now from Kusal Perera, overpitched outside off, he gets half forward and drives it right between mid off and extra cover
uses the angle now to work it from middle to vacant midwicket, and comes back for two
short, outside off, he sways away this time, and drops his wrists, he wants to go on
comes forward and runs a length ball wide of cover for one more
works off the pad behind square leg
tossed, full and quick, pushes forward to defend down the pitch
flighted slower, he lunges forward to slog sweep, does not quite time it, through square leg
comes out, takes it on the full and eases it to long on, who runs hard to his left to keep them to one
on the full again, through midwicket now, and that is a maiden fifty for Kusal Janith Perera, cheers ring around the grass banks
Chandimal in trouble with the running again, wants the second after a tuck to midwicket, man in the deep runs in and throws, Chandimal has to dive back, and settle for one
how did that miss leg stump, Mushfiqur appeals loudly for leg before, bowler not so convinced, Chanidmal playing around this full one, headed down leg
Chandimal tries to clear long on now, comes out, he's not to the pitch, has a heave and finds the man on the boundary, he's not comfortable in this format, Chandimal
thick outside edge off a full ball on the stumps, tight single to short third
flat, shortish, he goes down in a powerful sweep, but there is a man at deep square
pushed down the track
very fast and angled across, guided through point
tries to sweep and misses, Mushfiqur puts in a series of quick shouts, but that pitched outside leg
angled in short and flat from round the stumps, punched to sweeper cover
comes down, and nudges through vacant midwicket for a tight couple, sensible stuff from Kusal
full into the pads, turned square, keeper after it
wide, and cut in the gap wide of the sweeper for two more
hit on the pads once again, and another appeal turned down, clearly headed down leg with so much angle
waste of a wicket, Thirimanne turns a fast one off the pads to short fine, somehow thinks it is worth a single, and is caught a few feet in no-way-back land as the throw arrives at the striker's  end
flighted slowly, he walks out and pushes to cover
leans out and turns a full one to long on
eases another full one to long on
flighted full, he waits for it to come on, and pushes to leg for one more
flat and down the pads, swept down to short fine leg
chops a cut into the ground, it rolls to point
spins down the pads, but his nudge finds short fine, a fumble concedes one
fires a rocket down leg from round the stumps
that kept soaring, would have kept deep midwicket interested for a while, but it was timed so well it sailed well over the boundary, Kusal stepping out and lofting, exuding calm in everything
now walls out and picks up two more with a push through midwicket
comes out again, and takes it on the pad as he tries to defend
he's gone this time, on the cut, backed away to a flat and widish one, but ended up getting a healthy edge through to Mushfiqur
some late outswing, he checks the drive to extra cover
mistimes a punch to the bowler off a length ball, did not quite come on, bowler tumbles and fields
some more away shape, Angelo drives, extra cover dives, and only a single is conceded
short, and widish, he hops in the air and thrashes a cut high over point
slow at 117 kph outside off, he nudges it to leg for one
punched down to long on
walks across, gets one tossed up slowly, comes forward to defend
comes out and turns it in front of square leg
flat, on off, punched past a running midwicket, and they come back for two
tosses it up and sends it down leg with the angle
short and fast at 95 kph, he adjusts to punch off the back foot to long on
he is already outside off, it comes wide outside, and he cracks it wide of the sweeper
pushed in the air down to long on
loud shout for lbw, that hit him in front of off on a missed sweep, pitching in line with the stumps, did not straighten enough though
one more lbw appeal, this time there is a thick inside edge onto pad
very wide down leg, he reaches for it and drags it one-handed through square leg, another fumble in the deep
fired full and straight down leg
steered behind point
good length on the pads, worked through midwicket
comes out and swings off a thick edge to short third, who throws it low to the keeper, he helps it on its way to the stumps, but the batsman is just in
slow and down the leg side, he is beaten, as is the keeper

what a clanger, two men almost collide at deep midwicket, and concede the boundary, Angelo heaved it from outside leg, hadn't got hold of it, it stayed airborne for a long time, came down well inside the rope, but the two deep fielders ran towards it and almost into each other
drills a very wide one to extra cover, would have been a wide
turned off the pad through midwicket
dabbed softly to cover
in the slot for the slog sweep, and he picks it wide of deep midwicket, carries all the way
nice, now he withdraws outside leg, takes up a flighted one and sends it screaming over deep extra cover for six more
mistimes a sweep to square leg for a single
has a heave off the pad, misses, short fine cuts it off
way down the leg side, and that will beat the batsman's attempted sweep, the keeper's attempted take and the fielder's attempted chase
a reverse sweep now, runs gently to short third man
Angelo heaves and misses once more, but fortunately his leg stump does not take a hit
what a welcome back for Rubel, shortish across the left-hander, Jeevan shuffles and wallops it high and mighty over deep square leg, miles into the crowd
short and wide outside off, and that has flown past the deep point boundary in an instant, it was cut so hard
good length, but provides width once more, crunched through extra cover, sweeper cuts it off
Angelo continues to struggle with timing, hits a pitched up delivery on leg to long on
gone this time, Jeevan tries to swing a length ball through midwicket, misses and Rubel hits
gets a bouncer first up, and ducks under it
Shahadat starts with a high full toss that is swung wide of deep midwicket, the fielder scrambles to his left to save the boundary
low full toss around off, Angelo opens the face to run it to deep point
a Thisara thwack through midwicket, flat and powerful, bounces just before it brushes the rope
slow length ball on middle, and Thisara effortlessly picks it over deep square leg, off the front foot too
oh dear, full and very wide with short third man up, four more over him with a thick edge after Thisara has a go at it
oh dear again, as he sends it wider outside off, Mishfiq takes it where first slip would have been
and the moment he lands it on a length around the stumps, Thisara is waiting to send it climbing into the Pallekele evening air, over deep square leg
full toss hit to long on
full and on the pads, can't swing it away to leg, it runs behind square
yorker right on middle, he was backing away to leg, and jammed the bat down just in time
full on leg stump, heaved off a thick inside edge to deep square, the throw needs Mushfiq to be six feet tall, he isn't, but no overthrow conceded
Bangladesh all over Pallekele, Angelo flat bats a heave from close to the toe end to long off, he fumbles and it almost runs into the rope before he recovers to put in a slide
overpitched, lofted on the bounce to long off, Angelo pushes for the second, and makes it
